videos.author: LegenVD
videos.title: I make a lot of +1+1 counters in this video.
videos.description:
Magic: The Gathering Arena deck tech & gameplay with a monogreen +1/+1 counter deck, featuring Nissa, Voice of Zendikar as commander in Brawl.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD

0:08:50 - vs Loot, the Key to Everything

0:36:47 - vs Muldrotha, the Gravetide
0:46:21 - vs Vadrok, Apex of Thunder
0:52:08 - vs Tatyova, Benthic Druid
0:57:56 - vs The Mycosynth
1:04:33 - vs Tinybones, Bauble Burglar
1:10:08 - vs The First Sliver
1:13:37 - vs The Scarab God
1:21:18 - vs Jaxis, the Troublemaker
